verses.verse: By <S%H3915>night<s%> on my <S%H4904>bed<s%> I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%>: I <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H4672>him<s%>, but I found him not.

I <S%H6965>said<s%>, I will rise <S%H5437>now<s%>, and go about the <S%H5892>city<s%>; In the <S%H7784>streets<s%> and in the broad <S%H7339>ways<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%>: I <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H4672>him<s%>, but I found him not.
The <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> that go <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7200>me<s%>; To whom I said, Saw ye him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%>?

It was but a <S%H4592>little<s%> that I <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H4672>them<s%>, When I found him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%>: I <S%H270>held<s%> <S%H7503>him<s%>, and would not let him go, Until I had <S%H935>brought<s%> him into my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, And into the <S%H2315>chamber<s%> of her that conceived <S%H2029>me<s%>.

I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> <S%H1323>you<s%>, O daughters of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, By the <S%H6643>roes<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> by the <S%H355>hinds<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, That ye stir not <S%H5782>up<s%>, nor <S%H5782>awake<s%> my <S%H160>love<s%>, Until he <S%H2654>please<s%>.

Who is this that <S%H5927>cometh<s%> up from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> Like <S%H8490>pillars<s%> of <S%H6227>smoke<s%>, <S%H6999>Perfumed<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> and <S%H3828>frankincense<s%>, With all <S%H81>powders<s%> of the <S%H7402>merchant<s%>?
Behold <S%H8010><s%>, it is the <S%H4296>litter<s%> <S%H8346>Threescore<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men are <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H1368>it<s%>, Of the mighty men of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

They all <S%H270>handle<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and are <S%H3925>expert<s%> in <S%H4421>war<s%>: Every <S%H376>man<s%> hath his <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon his <S%H3409>thigh<s%>, Because of <S%H6343>fear<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>.
King <S%H4428><s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> himself a <S%H668>palanquin<s%> Of the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> thereof of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, The <S%H7507>bottom<s%> thereof of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, the <S%H4817>seat<s%> of it of <S%H713>purple<s%>, The <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof being <S%H7528>paved<s%> with <S%H160>love<s%>, From the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, O ye <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, With the <S%H5850>crown<s%> wherewith his <S%H517>mother<s%> hath <S%H5849>crowned<s%> him In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2861>espousals<s%>, And in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
